website_summaries.verdict: The Propet TravelFit came highly praised for the comfort it offered, especially because it helped relieve foot pain. Reviewers also lauded its lightweight and breathable nature. However, one of the major complaints buyers had with the trainer was that it ran short and narrow. It was also considered expensive given its quality issues. But in the end, those who were able to acquire the right size were contented with their purchase.
pros: A lot of wearers described the Propet TravelFit as a very comfortable pair of walking shoes
The lightweight and breathable construction of the trainer pleased many owners
Multiple folks liked how the product fit their feet
According to several shoppers, the merchandise was priced reasonably given its quality build
Some users commended the arch support because it helped relieve foot pain
cons: A majority of the consumers complained that the Propet TravelFit ran short and narrow compared to other Propet models
More than a few people recommended adding an orthotic insole because the cushioning and arch support were lacking
The footgear was considered expensive given how the sole unit fell apart and the mesh upper developed holes after a few months of use, stated several purchasers

customer_reviews.title: Way too small  **Update to review**
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9 shoe.. every day for 20 years. This is NOT a size nine. Maybe it's a size 8... I am very disappointed. **** UPDATE **** Support was very friendly and refunded the $$ as soon as I ship the non-fitting pair back. I ended up trying another pair .. this time I went with a size 10 and they fit perfectly. The are a very comfy everyday shoe, not made for running long distances, or playing heavy sports, but for everyday wear? They feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: These ran extremely small and narrow. I have other Propet Shoes that fit true to size. These were not even close. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: baldnlextown

customer_reviews.title: Believe the "small" reviews
customer_reviews.text: Long time Propet wearer. This are not their usual 11.5 5E. As others have stated they are shorter and narrower. Had to return
customer_reviews.author: F. P. Stefano

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it runs small...
customer_reviews.text: Once you understand you need toorder a full size bigger, you will LOVE these. I have several pair of these and they feel wonderful right out of the box. They are my favorite all-around shoe. I finally ordered these in something besides solid black so I could designate ONE pair for at home and garden so I didn't get all my black shoes dirty! They are light weight, the tread isn't deep so it doesn't track in stuff on my shoes. I honest can't say enough good things about these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Hull

customer_reviews.title: OK lightweight sneaker
customer_reviews.text: good thing I ordered triple wide since they are still snug. I normally take an E or EE width, but now know that all shoes are made smaller these days. Otherwise, an OK, light weight sneaker for traveling use (gym, walking,).
customer_reviews.author: GregA

customer_reviews.title: Expected Fit & Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit as expected (extra wide for me) and is extremely light weight, especially for its 13 extra-wide size! Toe box is not as deep as i would have liked and i had to add another heel insole to soften the heel impact but otherwise i like the shoe. Like the fact that it has 6 eyelets so laces are close together and more comfortable and mesh construction is ideal for my purposes. All in all, a good shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much too small
customer_reviews.text: One of those times I read the reviews that all said these run small but didn't listen. We have other pairs of Propet shoes but this is the first ones that are too small. Perhaps the company should find another manufacturer for this style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for casual use
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes for around the house, driving or brief shopping. They are super soft and comfy, and my feet don’t sweat when wearing them. Their softness is the reason they are NOT appropriate for long walks: they don’t have enough support. After wearing them for hours of walking, my feet and legs are sore. Love them for casual use though—one of the most comfortable pairs I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: We tried other shoes but they would not give when her feet and ankles swell like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: My mother needed some shoes and these where the only ones that fit. They do run small . We tried other shoes but they would not give when her feet and ankles swell like these shoes. We went with men's shoes because they come wider than women shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Magbee

customer_reviews.title: The NOT so wonderful world of color.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the photo of these on the page, but when they arrived they seemed darker and even a little purple over gray. I haven’t worn them yet. Debating whether to return them.
customer_reviews.author: "Loopydloop"

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking they'd be the answer for some basic walking shoes. I was wrong. These run small. If you are thinking of buying them, ya gotta go up one full size. My feet are skinny but the D/Medium width was perfect. The problem was the toe area... its right on your toes.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are great sneakers. Aside from a pair of Jordans that I owned a few years ago, these are the most comfortable pair of sneakers I’ve ever worn. I will definitely be looking for Propèt next time I need a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Epperson

customer_reviews.title: Not gray
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are green. I was going to send them back, but I was told they could not be returned. I got a refund and was allowed to keep the shoes. A bit tight in the toes, otherwise true to fit
customer_reviews.author: ky40311

customer_reviews.title: YOU SHOULD ORDER 1 WHOLE SIZE LARGER...
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 9.5 4E in New Balance shoes, but after seeing reviews say they run small, I ordered a size10 5E...I SHOULD have ordered 10.5, and, as for the 5E width, these are NOWHERE near a 5E...they are much skinnier. Overall, the feel of the shoe is nice, it's very light. I will return these for a 10.5 5E...unless they have a 6E. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizes runs a bit small.
customer_reviews.text: The size is a bit too small, but I'm wearing them anyway. A very light shoe, not sure how long they will last. But I guess you should replace walking shoes every year, so I am sure it will make it at least that long. I like the design and is far better for walking than a running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel mills

customer_reviews.title: which excellent if you need large shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and breathable, which excellent if you need large shoes. not so great if you are going to be in an environment where spills or puddles are more likely since they are mostly mesh and it will go right through it and soak your socks/feet. they run a little narrowwer and smaller than other Propets
customer_reviews.author: Khezekiah

customer_reviews.title: When I ordered these it said X-wide but they're only 3E not 4E like for most X-wide mens shoes
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for true 4E wide shoes, skip these. They're only 3E and they definitely weren't wide enough for him.
customer_reviews.author: StoneHenge

customer_reviews.title: Very good fit, light with very good support
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these - comfortable and light, with very good support. He has large feet, so these were perfect for him due to room in the tie box. Dressy enough in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: JanBear

customer_reviews.title: this time but it was so a 9EE would have worked out better. Also
customer_reviews.text: The size is smaller than U.S. which happens allot. However I was hoping it would not be the case, this time but it was so a 9EE would have worked out better. Also, the color was not even what was expected, it was not at all a good color, black would be better. I'm sending them back in hopes of getting a different size and color.
customer_reviews.author: Larry H.

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and very light
customer_reviews.text: Lightest shoes I have ever had. Almost like not wearing shoes at all. Not much cushion though and I feel the ground when I walk/run.
customer_reviews.author: William Nicolson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable. I added some silicon shoelaces and now they are slip-ons. I have had problems walking due to foot (feet?) problems, but these make it easier, probably 'cos they are available in a wide width, so they are not as snug as other shoes I have.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Crow

customer_reviews.title: I like Proper walking shoes for its light weight and many ...
customer_reviews.text: I like Proper walking shoes for its light weight and many design choices. And, they have many extra wide sizes. I always wear size 8.5 3E width. Unfortunately, I had to return this size 8.5 5E wide for being too short. I re-ordered a pair of size 9.0 5E wide. And, it was still a little tight on the toes. The width fitted just right. I really like the designs and choice of Proper. But, they really REALLY need to get the size right.
customer_reviews.author: Mini Moat

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and it'll work, but it won't last
customer_reviews.text: Did not last long, after about a month or so I found myself less-inclined to wear these at all, subconsciously. Seemed to have broken down rather quickly, but they are cheap and were comfortable and lightweight while they were new.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: not a lot of cushion and surprisingly small. I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: not a lot of cushion and surprisingly small. I'm about a 14 1/2, which of course doesn't exist. 14s are usually to small and 15s are too wide for me. My previous Propet sneakers were roomier, The SQUASH shoes which are white with green trim
customer_reviews.author: Robert, Connecticut

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: There is definitely a difference between 5E and 6E width. Otherwise, they are soft and do not create pressure. They are a tad shorter in length compared to other Size 10's of the same width. Recommend getting 1/2 size bigger than expected size.
customer_reviews.author: B. L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Eh, they're okay.
customer_reviews.text: My husband wasn't a fan of the color and they could've used a tad more cushion in them.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Brandon Ponton Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable and protected shoe ever- you’ll want 2+ pairs
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes Ever! Nice looking, light weight, extra wide + that’s impossible to find! I like these better than my LL Beans Big moccasin slippers. I may by a 2nd pair of these for slippers. Love this shoe!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Bomyea-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Propet’s are awesome
customer_reviews.text: I want to like these since they are cute but they are a little tight. I used them for kitchen work with my own insoles & they do fine one day on three off....
customer_reviews.author: CatComChefAO

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Taking the advice of another customer's review, I ordered a half size up, and the next step wider. That was exactly the right advice. These shoes are comfortable. They are lightweight which I wanted. I added a thin arch support as my feet are, uh-hem, problematic.
customer_reviews.author: D. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe great price
customer_reviews.text: So happy to find a shoe that fits my sons 14 wide foot that didn’t cost an arm and a leg. He works in a body shop and has to wash cars. The shoes don’t hurt his feet and they are holding up good getting wet daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, comfortable, and practical for multi-purpose wear.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as walking and hiking through a month long trip across Europe. They were very comfortable, fit as expected, and endured wear and tear much better than I anticipated. The seamless design contributes to the durability, and the mesh material allows for great circulation. With a quick clean up, they can quickly be camouflaged as an acceptable footwear in all of my outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought large on purpose to prevent sores on paralyzed husbands feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri B. Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is great and was working out until I started getting blisters
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is great and was working out until I started getting blisters. The inside of the right shoe was not finished correctly and after walking for several hours I had blisters on my foot. I'm not satisfied with quality control and inspection. Style is great.

customer_reviews.title: Propets used to be amazing, the last couple pairs I’ve brought have been ...
customer_reviews.text: These were too small and were stained. I sent them back. Propets used to be amazing, the last couple pairs I’ve brought have been real disappointments. I may be done with the brand.

customer_reviews.title: Nice airy shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice airy shoe. Fits well and is super light. The only drawback so far is the squeaking. They squeak like no tomorrow on tile flooring at my work.

customer_reviews.title: ... so I erred to next size up and was pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about size so I erred to next size up and was pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Slip and slide with each stride. Cant keep feet ...

customer_reviews.title: 9.5 size is a little tight.
customer_reviews.text: the shoes are great, very light and great to walk in. but the size 9.5 I bought is a bit tight in the toe area.

customer_reviews.title: Runs .5 size small
customer_reviews.text: I wear a US 10D shoe. This size ordered fits more like a US 9.5 D. Simple look that I like, but runs .5 size small for me.
customer_reviews.author: CJ in Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Very short for size 9 Propet, have you been ...
customer_reviews.text: Very short for size 9 Propet, have you been acquired by Nike? Are you using their sizing jigs? The current Propet shoes are all sized incorrectly. I’ve purchased 5 pairs of Size 9 and 9.5, in widths 3E and 5E, and there is no consistency. Sorry Propet, but I think I have to go back to New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: Link

customer_reviews.title: ... so I ordered a size bigger and it fits fine. Nice looking and good ventilation
customer_reviews.text: Does come a little small so I ordered a size bigger and it fits fine. Nice looking and good ventilation.

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, but shorter and narrower than advertised. I normally wear a 10.5 3E, but I needed to order 11 5E

customer_reviews.title: I bought this shoe as I believed the size would ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe as I believed the size would be the same as their similar McLean Walking shoe, boy was I wrong. I bought the extra width and it's still way too small. I can't wear them and as I'm in Australia I can't return them. Just be aware, these shoes are a very small size! I thought (wrongly) that sizes were universal, an extra wide size 10.5 is, in reality, a narrow 10. Not impressed.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and comfortable

customer_reviews.title: One of my worst purchases!
customer_reviews.text: One of my worst purchases !! Starting to fall apart after two weeks of use and not on a daily usage They were expensive, not worth the price , I wouldn't pay more then a few bucks for these shoes

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: A tad bit smaller than expected but not a deal killer. Like the look, the feel and the price!

customer_reviews.title: For a medium width these were quite wide.
customer_reviews.text: Other than being too wide for me, I was surprised that the gray was really a green-gray. That was OK for me, but color matters and should fit the description.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One of the shoes started falling apart the first week I got them.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: these shoes wear like slippers/ no break in necessary !

customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and was hoping they'd be wider.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and very comfortable. Great for a simple workout at the gym.

customer_reviews.text: As described. Sizing incorrect. Shoe is 1/2 size to small.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes at a comfortable price
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes at a comfortable price. Fit well and wear well.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who is very picky about his shoes and he actually started how much he liked the shoes I picked out for him. A very rare compliment from him.

customer_reviews.title: like the lightness for the summer
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of Prophet shoes...like the lightness for the summer.

customer_reviews.text: I have a 4E wide foot and the shoe fits me well. I wear orthotics, so I removed the insole. Good shoe.

customer_reviews.text: These shoes look too much like girl's shoes and do not run true to size. I normally wear 8.5 EE or EEE and the 8.5EEE were way too tight. I can not recommend these shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Last year I bought Size 10s (extra wide) that fit great. I reordered - but even 10 1/2s were ...

customer_reviews.text: They are not bad shoes, but they still make my feet hurt a little. I don't really notice an impact from them being wide.

customer_reviews.title: Came apart after wearing a few times
customer_reviews.text: Shoelace eyelet/grommet came apart after wearing these a few times over the course of 5 weeks and now it is too late to return them. Bummer.

customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a pair of shoes and they were very tight so I just put them away never to be used

customer_reviews.text: Comfort, support five stars in an appealing package....ill buy another pair.

customer_reviews.title: size is perfect, very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: size is perfect, very comfortable shoes, already had a black pair that are me favorite walkers, and wanted another color option

customer_reviews.text: I returned it. It didn't seem to have the usual Propet padding.

customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase ,these shoes are lightweight and very comfortable.

customer_reviews.text: so far, I love them. Had to add an insert though.

customer_reviews.text: They Where too small and I ordered an over sized shoe also they where to narrow. I orderd one size up from my normal shoe size so I could fit them with my orthotic inserts.

customer_reviews.title: Shoe feels great I ordered size 15 and it says 15 on ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoe feels great I ordered size 15 and it says 15 on box and paperwork but shoe is size 13
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but....
customer_reviews.text: There is some variability in Propet shoe sizing. The flexible nature of this shoe means you can get away will a slightly small shoe

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Part of the sole came off after the 5 time wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: billy rogers

customer_reviews.title: need to be much wider I wear the McLean mesh ...
customer_reviews.text: need to be much wider I wear the McLean mesh at same side and they fit. probably need a 6e in the travelfit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the fit and look of the Travelfit
customer_reviews.text: My feet are always warm and sweat profusely if the shoe is not breathable. I bought these hoping they were Propet's replacement for the McLean mesh. I like the fit and look of the Travelfit, but it was much hotter than the McLean mesh, so my feet were uncomfortable. I cut out most of the internal insulation, and now it is breathable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: These are nor wide shoes.
customer_reviews.text: The sizing of the Propet shoes and what is represented on line and on the shoe label have absolutely no correlation one with the other. The supposedly 10 5E that I received are at best a 9 1/2 and just a normal D width. Propet claims that it makes wide sizes available but I agree with the other reviewers who have found that the claimed wide sizes just don't exist with Propet.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great extra width shoe for wheelchair user with feet that swell during the day
customer_reviews.author: Phil Case

customer_reviews.title: A Very Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Propet shoes for my mother for a number of years. I had always viewed them as a long-lasting old lady's shoe. I bought these on a whim because the price seemed good. They are a very comfortable shoe that needed no breaking-in. I liked its style, though that might be because I just turned 70.
customer_reviews.author: atomicbohr

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the angle drops to much on the out side of the foot, the foam that they use to coshin the foot is the sole execpt at the heal. I ware 1/2 though the sole at the front in 3 weeks

customer_reviews.text: Ordered a second pair - they fit so well (by ordering a half-size larger) and are so comfortable. I want another pair to have when my first wear out.

product_meta.title: Propét Men's MAA002M Walking Shoe
product_meta.description: The travelfit is your perfect travel companion. fun colors and an adjustable bungee lace lets you slip these on and go
